name: Havoc (itch) (ZekeLionhart, Johnny Fox, Wauei, luigic2)
description:
WASD - movement
Space - dash/evade (disabled)
Mouse - aim and attack
E - change weapon modifier (testing phase only)

You can currently switch between the basic staff and the flamethrower modifier. The modifier will every once in a while trigger a side-effect, jamming the flamethrower and spitting a lava blob.

=========================================

Jogo desenvolvido para a Ctrl Alt Jam pela equipe 8, Sentinela de Aço.

Sob a mentoria de: Fabiano Naspolini

Integrantes da Equipe:

  • Luiz Henrique P. de Carvalho (ZekeLionhart) - Game Design e Programador.
  • Gabriel Oliveira Turmina (Wauei) - Generalista e Programador.
  • Alessandro Bordini Scavacini (Johnny Fox) - Generalista 3D.
  • Luigi Cavalieri (luigic2)- Artista 2D e Sonoplastia.
